channel.title: RogEE Category Sorted Entries changelog
channel.description: Changes and updates to Michael Rog's Category Sorted Entries plug-in: http://michaelrog.com/ee/category-sorted-entries

item.title: Version 2.0.0
item.description:
• Version 1 is now Category Sorted Entries Lite, available for free at Devot:ee.
  • Version 2 features more parameters, more variables, Custom Channel Fields, faster processing, and much cleaner code.
  • 2.0.0 is a PUBLIC BETA release.
  • Available for purchase/download at Devot:ee.
